languages.text: [Протянуть инфопластину Соломону, но отдернуть в последний момент и улыбнуться] "Я не могу не спросить. Какая идея отсюда была фавориткой?"

traits.locale_text: протянуть книжку, но одернуть в последний момент — какая идея победила?

languages.text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"
languages.original_text: [Протянуть инфопластину Соломону, но отдернуть в последний момент и улыбнуться] "Я не могу не спросить. Какая идея отсюда была фавориткой?"

languages.text: [データスレートをソロモーンに差し出すが、直前で微笑みながら引っ込める]「どうしても聞きたいんだ。アイデアの中でどれが一番気に入った？」
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [データスレートをソロモーンに差し出すが、直前で微笑みながら引っ込める]「どうしても聞きたいんだ。アイデアの中でどれが一番気に入った？」

languages.text: [Solomorne den Datablock entgegenhalten, ihn dann aber im letzten Augenblick mit einem Lächeln zurückziehen] "Ich muss fragen. Welche der Ideen war Euer Favorit?"
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [Solomorne den Datablock entgegenhalten, ihn dann aber im letzten Augenblick mit einem Lächeln zurückziehen] "Ich muss fragen. Welche der Ideen war Euer Favorit?"

languages.text: [Tendre la plaque de données à Solomorne, avant de la retirer à la dernière minute avec un sourire] « Je suis {mf|curieux|curieuse}. Laquelle de ces idées avait votre préférence ? »
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [Tendre la plaque de données à Solomorne, avant de la retirer à la dernière minute avec un sourire] « Je suis {mf|curieux|curieuse}. Laquelle de ces idées avait votre préférence ? »

languages.text: [Ofrecer la tablilla de datos a Solomorne, pero retirarla en el último instante con una sonrisa] «Siento curiosidad. ¿Cuál de esas reflexiones le gusta más?».
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [Ofrecer la tablilla de datos a Solomorne, pero retirarla en el último instante con una sonrisa] «Siento curiosidad. ¿Cuál de esas reflexiones le gusta más?».

languages.text: [将数据板递给索罗蒙，但在最后一刻笑着把它抽回来]“我得问问你，这些想法之中，你最喜欢哪个？”
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [将数据板递给索罗蒙，但在最后一刻笑着把它抽回来]“我得问问你，这些想法之中，你最喜欢哪个？”

languages.text: [Databelayı Solomorne'a uzatıp son anda gülümseme eşliğinde geri çek] "Merak ettim, yazdıkların içinde en hoşuna gideni hangisiydi?"
languages.original_text: [Hold out the data-slate to Solomorne, but pull it back at the last minute with a smile] "I have to ask. Which of the ideas was your favourite?"

traits.locale_text: [Databelayı Solomorne'a uzat ancak son anda bir gülümsemeyle geri çek] "Merak ettim, yazdıkların içinde en hoşuna gideni hangisiydi?"
